description:
Raoh destroyed the Divine Fist of the North Star`s 2,000 years of history.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La capitale du Nanto tremble ! Les deux frères du Hokuto arrivent enfin !!
The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!!
Yureru Nanto no Miyako! Tsuini Hokuto 2 Kyoudai ga Yatte Kita!!
ゆれる南斗の都! 遂に北斗2兄弟がやってきた!!
